description: This file initializes an Agent with a specific Claude model and demonstrates how to generate and print a response to a prompt, specifically for streaming output.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with language models, capable of running prompts and printing responses.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class representing the Anthropic Claude model.

methods.name: Agent.__init__
methods.description: Initializes an Agent with specified model and options.

methods.name: Agent.run
methods.description: Executes a prompt with the agent, optionally streaming the response.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Prints the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.

methods.name: Claude.__init__
methods.description: Initializes the Claude model with specified parameters.
